title: Reduces sales tax by one percent on vehicles manufactured in the United States
summary: Reduces sales tax on vehicles manufactured in the United states by one percent; provides that the commissioner of taxation and finance shall obtain a listing of such vehicles from the commissioner of motor vehicles yearly.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2763

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. PRETLOW -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. CLARK,
         COOK, GABRYSZAK, MORELLE, PERRY, WRIGHT -- read once and  referred  to
         the Committee on Ways and Means

       AN  ACT  to amend the tax law, in relation to reduced sales tax on vehi-
         cles manufactured in the United States

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  tax law is amended by adding a new section 1105-D to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S 1105-D. REDUCED SALES TAX ON CERTAIN MOTOR  VEHICLES.  (A)  THE  TAX
    4  IMPOSED  BY  SUBDIVISION (A) OF SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED FIVE OF THIS PART
    5  SHALL BE REDUCED BY ONE PERCENT WHEN BEING IMPOSED UPON  MOTOR  VEHICLES
    6  MANUFACTURED IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
    7    (B)  FOR PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION, THE TERM MOTOR VEHICLE SHALL MEAN A
    8  VEHICLE AS DEFINED IN SECTION ONE HUNDRED TWENTY-FIVE OF THE VEHICLE AND
    9  TRAFFIC LAW.
   10    (C) THE COMMISSIONER SHALL OBTAIN  YEARLY  FROM  THE  COMMISSIONER  OF
   11  MOTOR  VEHICLES  A LIST OF VEHICLES MANUFACTURED IN THE UNITED STATES OF
   12  AMERICA.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   14  it shall have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02593-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to reduced sales tax on vehicles manufactured in the United States
